title: kriSNA mAkEmi
sahitya:
krSNA mAkEmi dOva baluku kIrti galgu dEvadEva bAla



caraNam 1



 sarike ravikelella bOyE verri kaliki lOrva vAyE shrI



caraNam 2



 sarivArilO siggu pOyEnIru jAnulapai dAganAye bAla



caraNam 3



 sarvamu nE nanukonna n du sAmarthyamu jUpu cinna bAla



caraNam 4



 bAyalEni mammu nIvu E upAyamaina delpi brOvu



caraNam 5



 mAtO jEraga inta bAdha galge maratuma ika prANanAtha bAla



caraNam 6



 indu kanucu talli sAkeno lEka E pApula kaNDlu tAkeno bAla



caraNam 7



 rAkendu mukha dayarAda tyAgarAjArcita brOvarAdA bAla
